issue.title: yahoo.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Trackers) [http://yahoo.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fyahoo.com) ### Comment > After updating AdGuard Home to v0.107.65 on OpenWrt, ads are no longer being blocked. This issue started immediately after the update. > > Environment: > • Platform: OpenWrt > • AdGuard Home version: v0.107.65 > • Installation method: manual binary > • DNS setup: AdGuard Home as main DNS, with upstream resolvers [e.g., DoH/DoT or plain DNS] > • Filters enabled: AdGuard Base, EasyList, [any other filters you use] > > Troubleshooting done: > • Restarted the service and OpenWrt device > • Cleared DNS cache > • Re-downloaded filters > > But the issue still persists. > > Could you please check this problem or suggest a workaround? > > Thank you for your support and continuous updates. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/p4ml6j953uo4k4gskogg4skoks8os0kew57do8nyhs.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/n1pnol1xw34osgs4wsgk8gkcwo8kgkw5c3eepjg2wk.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS DNS setup: | AdGuard Home DNS server: | AdGuard DNS Default server System version: | `MacOS Sequoia 15.6.1` Browser: | Firefox Blocklists: | General:

issue.title: www.outbrain.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.outbrain.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.outbrain.com%2F) ### Comment > Zabawna sprawa. Bo zazwyczaj blokuje się Outbraina, ale ja muszę się tam logować ze względów zawodowych. ALe mimo tego, że dodaje reguły niestandardowe `(@@||www.outbrain.com^$important` > `@@||outbrain.com^$important` > `@@||my.outbrain.com^$important)` to nie jestem w stanie się tam zalogować i zawsze dostaje komunikat przeglądarki ERR_ADDRESS_INVALID. Jakiś pomysł co mam dodać w regułach, żeby Adguard pozwlił mi się tam dostac. ``` Username: @BRLosiu ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/j727hnmqoc8wc44wck4s8kkk0oksk8w1h1ppzt5kmg.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/et1c5iktbhkooggcg0gkg8k8g00gkcok85ke35lngg.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- Platform: | OPNSense with Adguard addon v0.107.64 System version: | `OPNSense` Browser: | Chrome Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base Other extensions used: | `Eset Internet Security`

comment.body:
What are your upstream servers?
Is your device configured with a backup DNS or is it using AdGuard Home as a single DNS server?
